conclusion: Initial analysis of the problem scenario
Object A is on the left side of the image
Object B is on the right side of the image
Objects C and D are in the center of the image
Objects A and B move through the air and are placed down at the location of objects A, B, C, and D
Objects A and B will replace the positions of objects C and D
Objects A and B will come into contact with objects C and D due to gravity
Objects C and D are replaced by objects A and B
Final answer: Objects A and B will replace the positions of objects C and D, and they will come into contact with each other and with the original objects C and D due to gravity
